channel.title: Help restarting my coding process
channel.description:
Ive spent a lot of time coding a server that was never online before on my old computer just trying to learn to code cause I always wished I could learn to design my own game that I been thinking of ideas for.(rsps's was probley not the right type of coding to learn for that and im probley way off on what I need to learn) but never the less im a lot older know and just got new computer and I wanted to try and learn to code again. my biggest problem is I don't even got a source and client base yet cause im scared to download on this new computer. is the ways to know if something I download has viruses? and I tried to research making a rsps from scratch without downloading a base but I couldn't find anything.
my main questions I can think of atm...
1.) What are few ways to determain if something is safe to download or not? 2.) is there a way to basically get only the map and graphics and weapons from rsps and create something completely different? 3.) If I did whats refered to in Q2, would it even be any more safe then downloading a base? (say delta or PI for instance) 4.) I liked coding the source last time I did it and really want to do again, but is rsps just a complete bad idea on a new computer anyways..?
P.s.: Any other random info you wanna give me that relates n any way to what this is about feel free. Also anyone that knows a lot about coding and whats to help me out once I get the source and client to start with let me know. (:
Thx. -mike

item.title: Help restarting my coding process
item.dc:creator: @trilogy-reborn trilogy-reborn
item.description:
@trilogy-reborn wrote:

thx m8 that’s the one I wanted to use anyways cause the designer looks to of went into a lot of detail on the small things since I normaly don’t see working cannons and perfect farming on older rsps’s and clue scrolls look well done… and well basically everything. well if I need anything else can I pm you or something?

-----------EDIT----------------
Dang I got client and source but now the link for the cache is not working

Read full topic

item.title: Help restarting my coding process
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“trilogy-reborn, post:3, topic:506565”]well can any1 take a look at these two server download links I found in server download section on here and let me know if either looks safe or looks like virus?
also which one would be better to code it back to as good of an oldschool (2006-2007) as I can?
And I didn’t even check if links are broken or not

1.) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,624575.0.html
2.) http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,594414.0.html[/quote]
Number 2 would be better. as it was made for 06. the first one was a pk server with high revision content added.

Read full topic

item.title: Help restarting my coding process
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“trilogy-reborn, post:1, topic:506565”]1.) What are few ways to determain if something is safe to download or not?
2.) is there a way to basically get only the map and graphics and weapons from rsps and create something completely different?
3.) If I did whats refered to in Q2, would it even be any more safe then downloading a base? (say delta or PI for instance)
4.) I liked coding the source last time I did it and really want to do again, but is rsps just a complete bad idea on a new computer anyways…?

P.s.: Any other random info you wanna give me that relates n any way to what this is about feel free. Also anyone that knows a lot about coding and whats to help me out once I get the source and client to start with let me know. (:

Thx.
-mike[/quote]

  1. Normally read the comments. Most threads get locked if a virus is proven to be found in the source, comments can always help.
  2. Uh, from what I’m reading here, you just want the cache data (that has all the maps, weapons, etc in it).
  3. You’d want to get a client with the cache at the minimal, because you need something to interpret the data in the cache, and hey, there’s a client pre-built for you that does such. as for safe wise, read my answer to 1.
  4. I don’t see how it could be a bad idea. Just get an IDE, and set up your java classpaths.

There’s plenty of people that can point you in the right direction with your source. Depending on what you have, take a look here:
Team J-Program thread
Also, this is the help section (for server sided issues) so feel free to ask questions for it.
Just don’t get a client issue confused with a server issue.

Read full topic
